title: Senior Data Engineer
summary: Design and build data platforms and pipelines for analytics and ML.
responsibilities: Own ingestion, transformation, orchestration, and reliability
Model data for analytics and ML consumers
Enable CI/CD, testing, and observability for data systems
requirements: Strong SQL and one of Python/Scala

title: Analytics Engineer
summary: Shape semantic models and metrics to drive decisions.
responsibilities: Partner with stakeholders to define metrics
Enable self-serve via semantic layers and docs
requirements: Experience with BI tools and dbt
